General.Description: With the purpose to improve the efficiency, value, and profitability of retail purchasing on board a commercial aircraft, Aero Coin (AERO) was created such an electronic payment method. It is also considered as one of the most fairly distributed crypto-currencies to date.
General.Features: Aero Coin is updated with several upcomming features are to further making our coin one of the most accepted and well-branded coins to date. These features include: android wallet, online payment gateways and the major focus will be on AEROME network.
General.Technology: Based on the X13 algorithm, the total POW Coins that AERO can create is about 7 million. The block time is just 90 sec for the maximum 7122 POW Blocks.
General.Sponsor: AERO which is created on 2014-06-18 with the main office in Dublin, Ireland.
